message.body: Hello from DC! Finally having a chance to run things by Sus and Melissa. I have a few errands I want to run with Mel in the morning so can we skip lunch? I want everything perfect for the afternoon. Sus says she could pick you and rachel up from union st
Glad you made it safely!!! And yes, 130 pickup at union station is perfect!!! Is there anything I might not be thinking of that I'll need to bring? Can't wait!!
Just bring work out clothes for pole dancing, your going out outfi
t and your change of clothes for Sunday brunch! Yayy
